Translations.Text: Al-Mulku Yawma'idhin Lillahi Yahkumu Baynahum Fa-Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Wa `Amilu As-Salihati Fi Jannati An-Na`imi
Wa Al-Ladhina Kafaru Wa Kadhabu Bi'ayatina Fa'ula'ika Lahum `Adhabun Muhinun
Wa Al-Ladhina Hajaru Fi Sabili Allahi Thumma Qutilu 'Aw Matu Layarzuqannahumu Allahu Rizqaan Hasanaan Wa 'Inna Allaha Lahuwa Khayru Ar-Raziqina
Layudkhilannahum Mudkhalaan Yarawnahu Wa 'Inna Allaha La`alimun Halimun
Dhalika Wa Man `Aqaba Bimithli Ma `Uqiba Bihi Thumma Bughiya `Alayhi Layansurannahu Allahu 'Inna Allaha La`afuwun Ghafurun
Dhalika Bi'anna Allaha Yuliju Al-Layla Fi An-Nahari Wa Yuliju An-Nahara Fi Al-Layli Wa 'Anna Allaha Sami`un Basirun
Dhalika Bi'anna Allaha Huwa Al-Haqqu Wa 'Anna Ma Yad`una Min Dunihi Huwa Al-Batilu Wa 'Anna Allaha Huwa Al-`Aliyu Al-Kabiru
Alam Tara 'Anna Allaha 'Anzala Mina As-Sama'i Ma'an Fatusbihu Al-'Aru Mukharratan 'Inna Allaha Latifun Khabirun
Lahu Ma Fi As-Samawati Wa Ma Fi Al-'Ari Wa 'Inna Allaha Lahuwa Al-Ghaniyu Al-Hamidu
